      • saveGame

        public void saveGame(GamePlay gamePlay)
        Divides the given GamePlay into pieces as level, player, and board.
        Parameters:
        gamePlay -
        Requires:
        Given GamePlay is not null, the components of GamePlay (level, board, player) is not null.

      • repOk

        public boolean repOk()
        Returns:
        true, if the class is ready to write a GamePlay. Otherwise, false.

      • write

        public void write()
        Writes GamePlay's data, which is given by saveGame method.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file will be written with this label.
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException, - TransformerException; if the data is corrupted or not in proper format.
        Requires:
        repOk check, the program should be able to write files to its directory.
